questions.label: ICEBREAKER
prompts: What is a place in San Diego that you want to visit?
What is the best TV show/movie that you watched recently?
Why are you interested in pursuing a PhD?
What is your favorite part of the UCSD campus?
Where were you born?
If you were to become a YouTuber, what would your topic be (e.g., vlogger, gamer, etc.)?
What institution did you attend before UCSD?
What is an item on your bucket list?
Would you rather spend time at the beach or in the snow? Why?
If you had to become a teacher, what subject would you teach?
Who is your favorite singer/band the moment?
Do you have any pets? Are you a dog person or a cat person?
What did you do this past quarter?
Who is the funniest person in your family?
What is something UCSD could use more of?
What is your favorite burrito in San Deigo?
Are you an indoor or outdoor person?
Do you follow any sports?
How do you like to spend your weekends?
What project are you most proud of?
